title: ONE GUY WANTS TO HACK MY ACC
body: ONE GUY WANTS TO HACK MY ACC PLES HELP

replies.body: Hey there, your best defense is to make sure to secure your info and our [account protection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) can help.  If you have anymore details about the claim, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) too so we can investigate further.
